title: Rising American Star AJ August Steps up to WorldTour with Ineos Grenadiers
content:
The 17-year-old has penned a three-year deal with the British squad that will see him ride in Ineos colors through 2026.

Read the full article at Rising American Star AJ August Steps up to WorldTour with Ineos Grenadiers on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
